message.original: テオドールの助力を得て 決戦のための準備を整える
message.translation: Obtain assistance from Theodor and prepare for battle

message.original: メルゴダで待つクラウスを訪ねる
message.translation: Pay a visit to Klaus, who is waiting in Mergoda

message.original: 巨人兵の居場所に関する情報を探す
message.translation: Seek information on the Giant Soldier and its whereabouts

message.original: 亡都メルゴダのワールドクエストを1回クリアする
message.translation: Clear one World Quest in Mergoda Ruins

message.original: 術師の取引所のアリアドネに報告する
message.translation: Report to Ariadne in Specialist Trading Post

message.original: 巨人兵のいる亡都メルゴダ王宮層へ向かう
message.translation: Seek out the Giant Soldier in Mergoda Ruins Royal Palace Level

message.original: 巨人兵ゴリアテを撃破し鍵を入手する
message.translation: Defeat the Giant Soldier Goliath in order to obtain the key
Hand over the key to Klaus

message.original: 謁見の間のジョゼフに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Joseph in Audience Chamber
